body:
## Description
Implement background jobs that continuously sync Sonarr and Radarr libraries, resolving conflicts automatically.

## Technical Requirements
- Scheduled background job system
- Conflict resolution algorithms
- Progress tracking and reporting
- Error recovery mechanisms
- Rate limiting for API calls

## Implementation Details
1. Create job scheduler using cron or similar
2. Implement sync logic with conflict detection
3. Add automatic conflict resolution strategies
4. Create monitoring dashboard
5. Add configuration options for sync frequency

## Conflict Resolution Strategies
- Newest wins (by modified date)
- Source priority (Sonarr > Radarr > Manual)
- Quality-based resolution
- User-defined rules

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Background jobs run on configurable schedule
- [ ] Libraries sync without manual intervention
- [ ] Conflicts are detected and resolved automatically
- [ ] Sync progress is visible in UI
- [ ] Failed syncs are retried with backoff
- [ ] API rate limits are respected
- [ ] Comprehensive logging of sync operations
- [ ] Unit tests cover all conflict scenarios

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for conflict resolution logic
- Integration tests with mock Sonarr/Radarr APIs
- Performance tests with large libraries
- Stress tests for concurrent syncs

## Configuration Options
- Sync frequency (minutes/hours/days)
- Conflict resolution strategy
- Retry attempts and backoff
- API rate limits
- Notification preferences

Builds on existing sync enhancements in #889.
